name: Gone Wrong
description: HARDEST GAME EVER?? NO FUN??Controls:- A , D - Left/Right Space - Jump/Double Jump Use fullscreen browser for better experience. BackStory: - Girl Finds out his Boyfriend is not paying enough attention to her, so she goes rouge and asks the plants and animals to kidnap her. The Boy goes on a adventure to convince the girl for his LOVE. Platforms being guarded by mushrooms, hidden plants, animals, barriers. Try to Impress and win back her.
